title: What is a 'seat'?
labels: How do I add a seat
how do I add a seat

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am interested in purchasing a license, or adding more activations to my current license.
  • I can see the option to add more 'seats' to my subscription. What does a 'seat' mean?

sections.title: Cause
content: Users who want to have more than one person within their Organization using a copy of Unity Pro will need to purchase extra 'seats' for new users using Unity software.

sections.title: Resolution
content: When you subscribe to Unity, you purchase a number of seats, which are access rights for each person in your Organization that will be using Unity.
For example, if you have 10 users on your team, you need a Unity Pro subscription with 10 seats, with each seat costing $125/month.

sections.title: More Information
content: For more information on how to add seats to your plan, please see this article.
